s.text: The article reveals that he recently transferred a huge chunk of stock to his charitable foundation, boosting its endowment to $17 billion.

The man whom competitors call the "Satan of Software" may throw temper tantrums and compete fiercely, but he's basically a fun-loving family guy who prefers sedans over limousines and breaks into mini-golf courses for kicks.
